title: Big Pharma Broke? Biden Big In Texas? 5.7.21
itunes:title: Big Pharma Broke? Biden Big In Texas? 5.7.21
description:
In episode 904, Jack and Miles are joined by Galaxy Brains's host Dave Schilling to discuss waiving the covid-19 vaccine patents, Joe Biden being more popular in Texas than their own Republican leaders, voter suppression, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Patents for COVID-19 vaccines slow global supply, raise risk of new variants, advocates say
  2. EU ‘ready to discuss’ COVID vaccine patent waiver as drugmakers push back
  3. Release the Vaccines
  4. The Arguments Against Sharing Covid-19 Intellectual Property Don’t Add Up
  5. WHO chief: waive Covid vaccine patents to put world on 'war footing'
  6. Cyber Attackers Leaked Covid-19 Vaccine Data After EU Hack
  7. North Korea accused of hacking Pfizer for Covid-19 vaccine data
  8. Pfizer and Moderna could score $32 billion in Covid-19 vaccine sales -- in 2021 alone
  9. Pressure Mounts to Lift Patent Protections on Coronavirus Vaccines
  10. HOLLYWOOD LOBBYISTS INTERVENE AGAINST PROPOSAL TO SHARE VACCINE TECHNOLOGY
  11. The Last Time a Vaccine Saved America
  12. When Russian and US scientists worked together on vaccines
  13. Texas Loves Joe Biden More Than Texas Loves Texas Republicans
  14. Florida Governor Ron DeSantis Signs a Voter Suppression Bill, and Fox News Has the Only Camera
  15. LISTEN: Flying Lotus - Pain and Blood

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
